content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ADULT-PROTECTION&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ADULT-PROTECTION&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>ADULT-PROTECTION List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ADULT-PROTECTION</link>  <description>ADULT-PROTECTION List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2014-08-22T14:08:54Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;e3625969.1408"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;560f8935.1405"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;e3625969.1408">   <title>New Publication </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;e3625969.1408</link>   <description> Apologies for cross-posting<br><br>The following text, released in October 2014, may be of interest to those working/studying/researching/teaching in the areas of Criminology, Criminal Justice, Social Work, Sociology, Mental Health Nursing or Psychiatry. A Companion to Criminal Justice, Mental Health and Risk provides succinct and critical definitions to key terms and themes in the converging areas of mental health, criminal justice and risk. It outlines the conceptual and practical challenges that exist through the collection of over 180 different entries of no more than 800 words in length, each written by academics, practitioners and policy writers who are experts in their [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-22T16:08:51+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Paul Taylor</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;e3625969.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;560f8935.1405">   <title>seeking a report/paper </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;560f8935.1405</link>   <description> Hi<br>I don't know if anyone in the network can help me but I am trying to locate a copy of a paper/report that was published in 2000.........Anatomy of a Disaster by Angela Peddar<br><br>I have Googled everything I can but don't seem to find it, so any help would be gratefully received [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-02T18:31:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bernie Gibbins</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-PROTECTION;560f8935.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
